snippet: Mikko Koivu, a first-line center and the team’s leading scorer with 35 points in 44 games, had surgery to repair a broken ankle.
lead_paragraph: Mikko Koivu, a first-line center and the team’s leading scorer with 35 points in 44 games, had surgery to repair a broken ankle.

headline.main: Wild Lose Captain Koivu to Injury
headline.print_headline: Wild Lose Captain Koivu to Injury
